sense.gloss: with the exception of, excepting, excluding
other place, somewhere else, outside one's group (family, company, etc.)

and so forth, and the like, and what have you, et cetera
outside (of a group, company, etc.), outside world
suburb, residential area on the outskirt of a city, commuter belt
foreign capital (e.g. in a company), foreign investment
going out, outing, leaving (one's home, office, etc.)
outpatient, outpatient care, outpatient clinic, outpatient ward
inside and outside, interior and exterior
inside and outside the country, home and abroad, domestic and foreign
foreign currency, foreign money, foreign exchange
outward appearance, exterior appearance, outward show, looks
foreigner (esp. one of European ancestry), gaijin
extra (e.g. performance, item, object, etc.), additional
to remove, to take off, to detach, to unfasten, to undo
to drop (e.g. from a team), to remove (from a position), to exclude, to expel
to leave (e.g. one's seat), to go away from, to step out, to slip away
to dodge (a question, blow, etc.), to evade, to sidestep, to avoid (e.g. peak season)
to miss (a target, chance, punch, etc.)
to be disconnected, to get out of place, to be off, to be out (e.g. of gear)
to miss the mark, to get it wrong (e.g. guess, expectation), to draw a blank (e.g. lottery)
to be removed, to be excluded
to be contrary to, to go against
orthopedic surgery, orthopaedic surgery, orthopedics, orthopaedics
another place, some other place, somewhere else, outside
another (person or thing), other, different, something else, someone else, the rest, et al.
except, but, other than, apart from
besides, in addition to, as well as, on top of

sdata.j: ↑外国↑↓がいこく↓↑人↑↓じん↓って↑面白↑↓おもしろ↓いなあ。
sdata.e: Foreign people intrigue me.

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓は↑真↑↓ま↓っ↑暗↑↓くら↓だ。
sdata.e: It's all dark outside.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑健康↑↓けんこう↓を↑度外視↑↓どがいし↓するわけにはいかない。
sdata.e: You can't afford to neglect your health.

sdata.j: ↑昨夜↑↓さくや↓↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓していましたか。
sdata.e: Did you go out last night?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑昨晩↑↓さくばん↓↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓しましたか。
sdata.e: Did you go out last night?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑今日↑↓きょう↓↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓しないほうがいい。
sdata.e: You'd better not go out today.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑今日↑↓きょう↓は↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓しないほうがよい。
sdata.e: You'd better not go out today.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑今日↑↓きょう↓↑外↑↓がい↓に↑出↑↓で↓てはならない。
sdata.e: You must not go out today.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑外来↑↓がいらい↓↑思想↑↓しそう↓に↑偏見↑↓へんけん↓を↑抱↑↓だ↓いているようだ。
sdata.e: You seem to be prejudiced against ideas that come from foreign countries.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑外国↑↓がいこく↓へ↑行↑↓い↓きたいですか。
sdata.e: Would you like to go abroad?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑海外↑↓かいがい↓へ↑行↑↓い↓くつもりですか。
sdata.e: Do you plan to go abroad?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓って、↑意外↑↓いがい↓に↑純情↑↓じゅんじょう↓だね。
sdata.e: I'm surprised that you're so naïve.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はなぜ↑海外↑↓かいがい↓で↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓をしたいのですか。
sdata.e: Why do you want to study abroad?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はどれくらいよく↑海外↑↓かいがい↓に↑行↑↓い↓きますか。
sdata.e: How often do you go abroad?

sdata.j: きみはどれくらいよく↑外国↑↓がいこく↓へ↑行↑↓い↓きますか。
sdata.e: How often do you go abroad?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はかぜをひいているので↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓してはいけない。
sdata.e: Since you have a cold, you must not go out.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑提案↑↓ていあん↓は↑問題↑↓もんだい↓↑外↑↓がい↓だ。
sdata.e: His proposal is out of the question.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓は↑問題↑↓もんだい↓↑外↑↓がい↓だ。
sdata.e: His proposal is out of the question.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑推測↑↓すいそく↓はまったく↑的外↑↓まとはず↓れだ。
sdata.e: Your guess is entirely off the mark.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓は↑例外↑↓れいがい↓としよう。
sdata.e: We will make an exception of your case.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑作文↑↓さくぶん↓↑以外↑↓いがい↓の↑作文↑↓さくぶん↓はみなよく↑書↑↓か↓けていた。
sdata.e: All the compositions were good except yours.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑作文↑↓さくぶん↓は↑綴↑↓つづ↓り↑字↑↓じ↓↑以外↑↓いがい↓はよく↑書↑↓か↓けていた。
sdata.e: Your composition was good except for the spelling.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言↑↓い↓う↑事↑↓こと↓は↑問題↑↓もんだい↓↑外↑↓がい↓である。
sdata.e: What you say is neither here nor there.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のおじさんは↑外国↑↓がいこく↓においでですか。
sdata.e: Is your uncle still abroad?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑会↑↓あ↓えるかと↑思↑↓おも↓って↑外↑↓そと↓で↑待↑↓ま↓っていた。
sdata.e: I waited outside on the chance of seeing you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓にここで↑会↑↓あ↓うのは↑全↑↓まった↓く↑意外↑↓いがい↓だ。
sdata.e: It is quite a surprise to see you here.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓するのは↑認↑↓みと↓められない。
sdata.e: I cannot approve of your going out with him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓するのには↑反対↑↓はんたい↓だ。
sdata.e: I don't approve of your going out with him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑外国↑↓がいこく↓↑語↑↓ご↓を↑学↑↓まな↓ぶ↑事↑↓こと↓は↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓です。
sdata.e: It is important for you to learn a foreign language.

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓が↑見↑↓み↓れるように、カーテンを↑開↑↓あ↓けてあげるね。
sdata.e: I'll open the curtain for you to look out.
